Comprehensive Garage Storage Systems

Our garage storage solutions are designed to handle everything from daily tools to seasonal decorations, creating a place for everything in your garage.

Wall-Mounted Cabinets

Heavy-duty cabinets with full-extension drawers provide secure, organized storage for tools, hardware, and supplies.

Features:

  • Full-extension drawer slides
  • Adjustable shelving
  • Locking options available
  • Multiple size configurations
  • Durable powder-coated finish

Perfect For:

  • Hand tools and power tools
  • Hardware and fasteners
  • Automotive supplies
  • Cleaning supplies

Workbenches with Tool Storage

Integrated workbench solutions combine a sturdy work surface with organized tool storage and optional lighting.

Features:

  • Heavy-duty work surface
  • Integrated tool storage
  • Pegboard backing
  • Optional LED lighting
  • Electrical outlet integration

Perfect For:

  • DIY projects and repairs
  • Hobby and craft work
  • Tool organization
  • Project workspace

Overhead Storage Racks

Maximize vertical space with ceiling-mounted storage perfect for bins, seasonal items, and bulky equipment.

Features:

  • Heavy-duty ceiling mounting
  • Adjustable height options
  • Multiple size configurations
  • Safety-rated weight capacity
  • Easy access design

Perfect For:

  • Holiday decorations
  • Seasonal sports equipment
  • Storage bins and boxes
  • Camping gear

Slatwall Systems

Flexible hanging storage that adapts to your changing needs with a variety of hooks, baskets, and accessories.

Features:

  • Flexible accessory system
  • Easy reconfiguration
  • Heavy-duty construction
  • Multiple finish options
  • Extensive accessory selection

Perfect For:

  • Garden tools and equipment
  • Sports equipment
  • Extension cords and hoses
  • Frequently used items

Specialty Storage Solutions

Every garage has unique storage challenges. Our specialty solutions address specific needs for different types of equipment and activities.

Sports Equipment Organization

Keep balls, bats, rackets, and gear organized and easily accessible for the whole family.

  • Ball storage cubbies
  • Bat and racket racks
  • Equipment bag hooks
  • Helmet and gear shelving

Garden Tool Storage

Organize rakes, shovels, hoses, and gardening supplies with dedicated storage solutions.

  • Long-handle tool racks
  • Hose storage and reels
  • Fertilizer and supply cabinets
  • Potting bench integration

Automotive Storage

Organize car care supplies, fluids, and automotive tools in dedicated storage areas.

  • Fluid storage cabinets
  • Tire storage racks
  • Tool chest integration
  • Parts organization systems

Seasonal Storage

Rotate seasonal items efficiently with accessible storage for decorations, equipment, and supplies.

  • Holiday decoration storage
  • Seasonal equipment racks
  • Climate-controlled options
  • Easy rotation systems

Built for Garage Conditions

Garage storage faces unique challenges. Our systems are specifically designed to withstand temperature fluctuations, humidity, and heavy use.

Temperature Resistant

Materials and finishes designed to withstand garage temperature extremes without warping, cracking, or degrading.

  • Engineered wood products
  • Powder-coated metal finishes
  • UV-resistant materials
  • Expansion joint considerations

Moisture Resistant

Sealed finishes and moisture-resistant materials protect against humidity and occasional water exposure.

  • Sealed cabinet construction
  • Moisture-resistant finishes
  • Ventilation considerations
  • Rust-resistant hardware

Heavy-Duty Construction

Robust construction handles the weight and wear of garage storage demands with commercial-grade components.

  • Reinforced mounting systems
  • Heavy-duty drawer slides
  • Commercial-grade hardware
  • Weight-rated components

Professional Installation Process

Our experienced installation team ensures your garage storage system is properly mounted and ready for years of reliable use.

1

Site Assessment

We evaluate your garage structure, electrical systems, and storage needs to ensure proper installation.

  • Wall and ceiling structure analysis
  • Electrical outlet locations
  • Clearance measurements
  • Load-bearing assessments
2

Preparation & Setup

Professional preparation ensures clean, efficient installation with minimal disruption to your routine.

  • Area protection and setup
  • Tool and equipment staging
  • Component organization
  • Safety protocol implementation
3

System Installation

Expert installation ensures all components are properly mounted, aligned, and functioning correctly.

  • Precise mounting and leveling
  • Hardware installation
  • System integration
  • Quality control checks
4

Final Inspection & Walkthrough

Complete system review and organization tips to help you maximize your new storage system.

  • System functionality testing
  • Organization recommendations
  • Maintenance guidelines
  • Warranty information
